snippet.title: A Guidebook of Babel - Digital Dragons 2021 Indie Celebration Showcase
snippet.description:
A Finalist for the Digital Dragons 2021 Indie Celebration, StarryStarry Games is proud to present the latest official game trailer and demo gameplay on Steam.

Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1467920/A_Guidebook_of_Babel/

Follow us:
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/GoBabelgame
Discord: https://discord.gg/3FGzR67gCw
